attributes.action: increase the value of the teaching profession, and respect to teachers by rightfully giving teachers the Dr. title.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Teachers are constantly researching, developing resources, providing training to co-professionals, being creative, and sharing best practice. We are essentially Doctors of Teaching, and learning is our practice. 

We are entrusted with educating tomorrows leaders. We deserve more respect and recognition, we are highly educated people.

Teachers are Doctors!
